experiences.subtitle: MSG Global Solutions, Bengaluru
workDescription: work in the insurance domain, building dynamic data entry tables integrated with standardized code tables for accurate data management.
I optimize React components with React.memo and react-window, implement dynamic routing with lazy loading, and improve state management using Context API and custom hooks.
I also created a reusable form builder with validation, reducing errors and speeding up development.

experiences.subtitle: A.P. Moller Maersk, Bengaluru
workDescription: Developed and tested backend services using Java and Spring Boot, contributing to the Visibility team under the ISCE Department.
Shipment Journey Service APIs: Developed and maintained APIs using Java and Spring Boot, achieving a 20% improvement in response times and seamless server-side logic.
Proxy API: Designed and implemented a proxy API with extensive testing, increasing API reliability by 30% and reducing latency by 15%.
Monitoring and Performance: Utilized Grafana and Prometheus for real-time performance tracking, reducing issue resolution time by 25% and enhancing system reliability.
